snippet: While the Eastman Kodak Company's early picture contests were national - and later international - there was no shortage of submissions from New York City photographers. A selection of photos from 1929 to the early 1940s.
abstract: While the Eastman Kodak Company's early picture contests were national - and later international - there was no shortage of submissions from New York City photographers. A selection of photos from 1929 to the early 1940s.

byline.original: By KERRI MACDONALD and DARCY EVELEIGH
